00022 /**
00023 * @file   GenotypeReportEngine.h
00024 * @author Luis Jevons
00025 * @date   Wed April 17 16:01:09 2009
00026 * 
00027 * @brief Core routines for genotype-report binaries. By separating the
00028 * command line parsing form the computation we allow a GUI application to share
00029 * the core computation once setting up the option class. 
00030 */
00031 #ifndef _GenotypeReportEngine_H_
00032 #define _GenotypeReportEngine_H_
00033 
00034 #include "util/BaseEngine.h"
00035 //
00036 #include <cstring>
00037 #include <fstream>
00038 #include <map>
00039 #include <string>
00040 //
00041 
00042 class GenotypeReportEngine : public BaseEngine {
00043 
00044 public:
00045 
00046         virtual std::string getEngineName() { return GenotypeReportEngine::EngineName(); }
00047         static const std::string EngineName() { return "GenotypeReportEngine"; }
00048 
00049         /**
00050         * Constructor
00051         */
00052         GenotypeReportEngine();
00053 
00054         /**
00055         * Destructor
00056         */
00057         ~GenotypeReportEngine();
00058 
00059         /*! A class to register the summary engine. */
00060         class Reg : public EngineReg
00061         {
00062         public:
00063                 /*! Constructor - register the summary engine. */
00064                 Reg() : EngineReg(GenotypeReportEngine::EngineName())
00065                 {
00066                 }
00067 
00068                 /*! Creates an object.
00069                  * @return The object.
00070                  */
00071                 BaseEngine *MakeObject() { return new GenotypeReportEngine; }
00072         };
00073 
00074         /*! The one and only registration object. */
00075         static Reg reg;
00076 
00077         /*! Converts the type to the summary engine type.
00078          * @param chip The pointer to the base engine object.
00079          * @return The summary engine type or NULL if not compatible.
00080          */
00081         static GenotypeReportEngine * FromBase(BaseEngine *engine);
00082 
00083 private:
00084 
00085         virtual void defineOptions();

00088         virtual void runImp();
00089         std::map<std::string, bool> CalculateMarkerReport();
00090         void CalculateSampleReport(const std::map<std::string, bool> &passedMarkers);
00091         void writeHeader(std::ofstream &out);
00092         std::map<std::string, bool> GetControlsFromMixFile();
00093 };
